src:
Miguel Oliveira Resmi Absen di Sisa MotoGP Malaysia
01 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Meski sempat turun dalam sesi latihan bebas pertama (FP1) MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Jumat (1/11/2019), debutan Red Bull KTM Tech 3, Miguel Oliveira, akhirnya dinyatakan tidak fit untuk melanjutkan pekan balap.
Oliveira mengalami kecelakaan hebat dalam sesi FP4 MotoGP Australia di Phillip Island akhir pekan lalu. Jatuh di Tikungan 1 dengan kecepatan tinggi, ditambah angin kencang, Oliveira mengalami kerusakan tendon pada kedua pergelangan tangannya.
Saat tiba di Sepang pada Kamis (31/10/2019), Oliveira menjalani pemeriksaan medis di Medical Center Sirkuit Sepang, dan dinyatakan fit untuk turun lintasan pada FP1, namun dengan catatan kondisi fisiknya akan kembali diperiksa usai sesi berakhir.
text:
Miguel Oliveira Officially Absent at the Time of Malaysian MotoGP
Nov 01 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Although it had dropped in the first free practice session (FP1) of the Malaysian MotoGP at the Sepang Circuit on Friday (1/11/2019), the debut of Red Bull KTM Tech 3, Miguel Oliveira, was finally declared unfit to continue racing week.
Oliveira had a big accident in the Australian MotoGP FP4 session at Phillip Island last weekend. Falls at Bend 1 at high speed, plus strong winds, Oliveira suffered tendon damage to both wrists.
Upon arriving at Sepang on Thursday (10/31/2019), Oliveira underwent a medical examination at the Sepang Circuit Medical Center, and was declared fit to go down the track on FP1, but with a note that her physical condition would be re-examined after the session ended.
